chief.note: Commissioned during a recess of the Senate; recommissioned on January 24, 1860, after confirmation. Also resident partly at San Jose.

chief.note: Presented credentials the same day as Minister Resident and as Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary. Commissioned to “the Central American States.”

chief.note: Commissioned during a recess of the Senate; recommissioned on December 10, 1908, after confirmation.
The new government of Costa Rica was still unrecognized by the United States when Hale left Costa Rica on April 19, 1917.

Not commissioned; nomination tabled by the Senate.

Took oath of office, but died in the United States before proceeding to post.
